title: What kind of Times...?
content:
Can somebody figure out if this “Times” font is manipulated, or is this a real one. If it is, wich kind of Times is it. Or what anykind of font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022737im_/http:/typophile.com/files/goods-1_4962.jpg)

Thanks for any help

 [‹ Antique Old Style No. 3](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022737/http:/typophile.com/node/42626 "Go to previous forum topic") [HELP! How much, can it be done, and who wants to do it? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022737/http:/typophile.com/node/49887 "Go to next forum topic")
author: K3N20

comments.content: Looks like Cochin with a stroke applied to me.

I created this with Cochin... Just added a small stroke to it. Looks like they may have modified the bar in the R to lose the curve. But perhaps it just becomes less distinguishable at low-res.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022737im_/http:/typophile.com/files/COCHIN_4665.jpg)

Serif brackets look a little different as well. They look heavier in your image.
Cochin it is. thank you so much!
